column1:
Section  3  of  the  UDA 
law  clearly  states 
that,  "declaring  an  area  as  a
development  area  shall  define  that  area  by  setting  out  the  metres  and  bounds  of

such  area".  Therefore,  a  plain  reading  of Section  3  of the  UDA 
law  makes 
it

absolutely 
clear 
that 
the  metres  and  bounds  setting  out 
to  define  No. 
159,
Baminiyawela Grama Niladhari  Division  will  not  apply  to  the  metres  and  bounds

in 
itself  is  a 
setting  out 
to  define  Puhulyaya  Grama  Niladhri  Division,  which

separate  Grama  Niladhari  Division.  The  Counsel  for 
the  Petitioner  has  drawn

"P7",  where 
the  Ambalantota 
attention 
to 
letter  dated  01/03/2017,  marked
